document.masterDocTitle: Review of the family Veliidae in Romania (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerromorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of the family Veliidae in Romania (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerromorpha)

subSubSection.paragraph:

,

,

.

,
Ilie ( 2001
, 2007, 2009 ),

,
2010
),
Ilie & Olosutean ( 2009 )
,
Ilie & Ban-Calefariu ( 2010 )
.

Remarks.
Microvelia reticulata
is the commonest representative of the Veliidae in Romania occurring in slow running streams, swamps and ponds with rich macrophyte vegetation. It was found in all the regions of the country at altitudes between 10 and 550 m a.s.l. (
Fig. 5
), occasionally in sympatry with
M . buenoi
and
M . pygmaea
.
